text:
I live a few blocks away and just recently purchased a Sub sandwich from the deli for the first time since the new owner took over almost 3 years ago,and the food was great! Im so happy I finally have good food close by I'm definitely coming back. 

P.s  They are not stingy with the meat!!

BEST FOOD ON WEST 25th !!
Fair prices, friendly customer service, big portions of good food !
Food was not to good I had no cheese they put cheese and my sandwich didn't come wit fries and my delivery was an hr late
